gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem

Interface Relation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<SemanticItem>, SemanticItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRelation, Conjunction, CoreferenceChain, Event, ImplicitRelation, Modification, Predication

    public interface Relation
extends SemanticItem
    An interface to implement for complex semantic objects (i.e, those with arguments). Arguments are role-semantic item pairs, and the semantic item of each argument can be other complex semantic objects; in other words, nested relations are allowed.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Removes an individual argument from the argument list.
